name: storyhouse-vip
description: Revolutionary Web3 Storytelling Platform built on Story Protocol - Chapter-level IP management with unified registration

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:contracts && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspace=@storyhouse/frontend
scripts.build:backend: npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspace=@storyhouse/backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf apps/*/node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/dist
scripts.test:quick: npm run test:local && npm run test:integration
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=@storyhouse/frontend && npm run lint --workspace=@storyhouse/backend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=@storyhouse/shared && npm run type-check --workspace=@storyhouse/frontend && npm run type-check --workspace=@storyhouse/backend

author: StoryHouse.vip Team
